description: |
  The 54th Statistical Days (Journées de Statistique) organized by the Société Française de Statistique (SFdS) is a major annual conference for the French-speaking statistical community, gathering researchers, educators, and professionals to discuss the latest developments in statistical theory and applications. The event covers a broad range of topics including statistical learning, high-dimensional data, risk and extreme value statistics, and non-parametric methods, while also fostering the growth of young statisticians through dedicated sessions and networking opportunities.
